title: Ashai alaigaL
sahitya:
Ashai iduvE shonnEn ennuLLE ATSi puriyum mannA Adi shivanE


anupallavi

  kAshiniyAlayap-pUjai maNiyAyen kavitai olittiDa karuNai vizhittezha


caraNam    tUya narambellAm dhum dhum ene olikka tOlum mrdangamAgi jhum ghum ene muzhanga
nEyam kalandu shruti suralayamennavE nI nAnenunilai tAnE iyalbAgum
